Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ai.AIAbstract class which AI agents must extend
ai.general.AttackManagerManages engaging the enemy
ai.general.ExplorationManagerManages what areas of the map should be explored
ai.general.FarmManagerManages the farming of resources
rts.GameUsed to set up and run games between agents
rts.GameStateProvides read access to game elements used by AIs
tests.GameVisualSimulationTestRuns a visualization of the game. This is probably the best place for debugging
ai.general.GeneralAIGeneral AI built to play any generically defined RTS game
ai.general.GeneralAIEnemyModel of enemy units
ai.general.GeneralAIExplorationModel of the map that needs to be explored
ai.general.GeneralAIFarmA farm is a place where one can gather resources it should define pathways for farmers to take
ai.general.GeneralAIObjectObjects that ai units can interact with
ai.general.GeneralAIProductionA task that needs to be produced
ai.general.GeneralAITownA group of buildings that are all together. Generally, towns are a stockpile, resources, and other buildings nearby
ai.general.GeneralAIUnitAn AI unit used by the GeneralAI. Allows for more sophisticated behaviors, like order queuing
ai.montecarlo.MonteCarloChooses moves based on a Monte Carlo simulation
util.Pair< T1, T2 >A pair of objects
rts.PhysicalGameStateRuns all of the logic of the game
gui.PhysicalGameStatePanelA graphical display of the game
ai.util.PlayerActionAbstraction of "player actions" for some AIs
ai.util.PlayerActionGeneratorGenerates a list of all possible PlayerAction
ai.general.ProductionManagerManages the various productions that are needed
ai.RandomAIMakes random moves
ai.RandomBiasedAIChooses random moves, but without a uniform probability for each move
util.SamplerSamples from a given distribution
ai.evaluation.SimpleEvaluationFunctionA simple evaluation function, (eg for use with Monte Carlo agents)
ai.general.TaskManagerTask managers manage the tasks that units can be assigned to
tests.TournamentRuns a Round-Robin Tournament against bots
ai.general.TownManagerA defense manager, mostly
ai.general.TrafficTraffic used by units so that complex routing can be done where they do not collide with each other
ai.general.TrafficMapTraffic used by units so that complex routing can be done where they do not collide with each other
rts.units.UnitRead access to a unit
rts.units.UnitActionThis is an action that a unit can take
rts.units.UnitDefinitionA general unit defintiion that could turn out to be anything
rts.units.UnitDefinitionManagerAll of the unit definitions
rts.units.UnitStatsThe stats that an individual unit has (this is an internal use only class)
rts.units.UnitUpgradeThe changes that get made to a unit when it upgrades
